Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ellis/54th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to street blockage near Ellis/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to street blockage near Ellis/54th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
